00034 void LoadWeaponIfNeeded(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00035 {
00036       UINT16 usInHand;
00037       INT8 bPayloadPocket;
00038 
00039       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("LoadWeaponIfNeeded"));
00040 
00041       usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
00042 
00043       if ( IsGrenadeLauncherAttached(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) 
00044             usInHand = GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
00045 
00046       // if he's got a MORTAR in his hand, make sure he has a MORTARSHELL avail.
00047       if (Item[usInHand].mortar )
00048       {
00049 //          bPayloadPocket = FindObj( pSoldier, MORTAR_SHELL );
00050             bPayloadPocket = FindLaunchable( pSoldier, usInHand );
00051             if (bPayloadPocket == NO_SLOT)
00052             {
00053 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00054                   NumMessage("LoadWeaponIfNeeded: ERROR - no mortar shells found to load MORTAR!  Guynum",pSoldier->ubID);
00055 #endif
00056                   return;     // no shells, can't fire the MORTAR
00057             }
00058       }
00059       // if he's got a GL in his hand, make sure he has some type of GRENADE avail.
00060       else if (Item[usInHand].grenadelauncher )
00061       {
00062             bPayloadPocket = FindGLGrenade( pSoldier );
00063             if (bPayloadPocket == NO_SLOT || FindNonSmokeLaunchableAttachment( &pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS],usInHand ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
00064             {
00065 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00066                   NumMessage("LoadWeaponIfNeeded: ERROR - no grenades found to load GLAUNCHER!  Guynum",pSoldier->ubID);
00067 #endif
00068                   return;     // no grenades, can't fire the GLAUNCHER... or the launcher has a magsize > 1
00069             }
00070       }
00071       // if he's got a RPG7 in his hand, make sure he has some type of RPG avail.
00072       else if (Item[usInHand].rocketlauncher && !Item[usInHand].singleshotrocketlauncher )
00073       {
00074             bPayloadPocket = FindLaunchable (pSoldier, usInHand );
00075             if (bPayloadPocket == NO_SLOT)
00076             {
00077                   return;     // no grenades, can't fire 
00078             }
00079       }
00080       else if (Item[usInHand].cannon )
00081       {
00082             bPayloadPocket = FindLaunchable( pSoldier, usInHand );
00083             if (bPayloadPocket == NO_SLOT)
00084             {
00085                   return;
00086             }
00087       }
00088       else
00089       {
00090             // regular hand-thrown grenade in hand, nothing to load!
00091             return;
00092       }
00093 
00094       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("LoadWeaponIfNeeded: remove payload from its pocket, and add it as the hand weapon's first attachment"));
00095       // remove payload from its pocket, and add it as the hand weapon's first attachment
00096 
00097       OBJECTTYPE Temp;
00098       CreateItem(pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].usItem,pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].bStatus[0],&Temp);
00099       AttachObject ( pSoldier, &pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS],&Temp,FALSE);
00100 
00101       //pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usAttachItem[0] = pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].usItem;
00102       //pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].bAttachStatus[0] = pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].bStatus[0];
00103 
00104       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
00105       {
00106             // don't remove ammo
00107             return;
00108       }
00109       // if there's only one in payload pocket (only/last grenade, or any shell)
00110       if ((Item[ pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].usItem ].ubPerPocket == 1) || (pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].ubNumberOfObjects == 1))
00111       {
00112             DeleteObj(&(pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket]));
00113       }
00114       else  // multiple grenades, remove one of them
00115       {
00116             pSoldier->inv[bPayloadPocket].ubNumberOfObjects--;
00117       }
00118 }

00364 
00365                    // if this chance to really hit between 50% worse to 50% better
00366                    if (iPercentBetter < PERCENT_TO_IGNORE_THREAT)
00367                         {
00368                          // then the one with the higher ATTACK VALUE is the better target
00369                          if (iAttackValue < pBestShot->iAttackValue)
00370                                // the previous guy is more important since he's more dangerous
00371                                continue;            // next opponent
00372                         }
00373       }
00374 
00375      // OOOF!  That was a lot of work!  But we've got a new best target!

00389 BOOLEAN CloseEnoughForGrenadeToss( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sGridNo2 )
00390 {
00391       INT16 sTempGridNo;
00392       INT8  bDirection;
00393       INT16 sXPos, sYPos, sXPos2, sYPos2;
00394       UINT8 ubMovementCost;
00395 
00396       if (sGridNo == sGridNo2 )
00397       {
00398             // checking the same space; if there is a closed door next to location in ANY direction then forget it 
00399             // (could be the player closed a door on us)
00400             for (bDirection = 0; bDirection < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDirection++)
00401             {
00402                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( bDirection ) );
00403                   ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sTempGridNo ][ bDirection ][ 0 ];
00404                   if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
00405                   {
00406                         ubMovementCost = DoorTravelCost( NULL, sTempGridNo, ubMovementCost, FALSE, NULL );
00407                   }
00408                   if ( ubMovementCost >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED)
00409                   {
00410                         return( FALSE );
00411                   }
00412             }
00413       }
00414       else
00415       {
00416             if ( CardinalSpacesAway( sGridNo, sGridNo2 ) > 2 )
00417             {
00418                   return( FALSE );
00419             }
00420 
00421             // we are within 1 space diagonally or at most 2 horizontally or vertically,
00422             // so we can now do a loop safely
00423             
00424             sTempGridNo = sGridNo;
00425 
00426             sXPos = CenterX( sGridNo );
00427             sYPos = CenterY( sGridNo );
00428             sXPos2 = CenterX( sGridNo2 );
00429             sYPos2 = CenterY( sGridNo2 );
00430             bDirection = atan8( sXPos, sYPos, sXPos2, sYPos2 );
00431 
00432             // For each step of the loop, we are checking for door or obstacle movement costs.  If we
00433             // find we're blocked, then this is no good for grenade tossing!
00434             do
00435             {
00436                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sTempGridNo, DirectionInc( bDirection ) );
00437                   ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sTempGridNo ][ bDirection ][ 0 ];
00438                   if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
00439                   {
00440                         ubMovementCost = DoorTravelCost( NULL, sTempGridNo, ubMovementCost, FALSE, NULL );
00441                   }
00442                   if ( ubMovementCost >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED)
00443                   {
00444                         return( FALSE );
00445                   }
00446             } while( sTempGridNo != sGridNo2 );
00447       }
00448 
00449       return( TRUE );
00450 }

01065                         // aim for the longest time possible!
01066 
01067                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcbestthrow: checking chance to hit");
01068                         if ( EXPLOSIVE_GUN( usInHand ) )
01069                         {
01070                               ubRawAPCost = MinAPsToShootOrStab( pSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE);
01071                               ubChanceToHit = (UINT8) AICalcChanceToHitGun(pSoldier, sGridNo, ubMaxPossibleAimTime, AIM_SHOT_TORSO );
01072                         }
01073                         else
01074                         {
01075                               // NB grenade launcher is NOT a direct fire weapon!
01076                               ubRawAPCost = (UINT8) MinAPsToThrow( pSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE );
01077                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2 , DBG_LEVEL_3 , String("Raw AP Cost = %d",ubRawAPCost ));
01078                               ubChanceToHit = (UINT8) CalcThrownChanceToHit( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubMaxPossibleAimTime, AIM_SHOT_TORSO );
01079                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2 , DBG_LEVEL_3 , String("Chance to hit = %d",ubChanceToHit ));
01080                         }
01081       
01082                         // mortars are inherently quite inaccurate, don't get proximity bonus
01083                         // rockets can go right past people too so...
01084                         if (!Item[usInHand].mortar && EXPLOSIVE_GUN( usInHand ) )
01085                         {
01086                               // special 50% to Hit bonus: this reflects that even if a tossed item
01087                               // misses by a bit, it's still likely to affect the intended target(s)
01088                               ubChanceToHit += (ubChanceToHit / 2);
01089 
01090                               // still can't let it go over 100% chance, though
01091                               if (ubChanceToHit > 100)
01092                               {
01093                                     ubChanceToHit = 100;
01094                               }
01095                         }
01096 
01097                          if (ubRawAPCost < 1)
01098                                ubRawAPCost = ubMinAPcost;
01099 
01100                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("calcbestthrow: checking hit rate: ubRawAPCost %d, ubMaxPossibleAimTime %d", ubRawAPCost, ubMaxPossibleAimTime ));
01101                         iHitRate = (pSoldier->bActionPoints * ubChanceToHit) / (ubRawAPCost + ubMaxPossibleAimTime);
01102                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcbestthrow: checked hit rate");
01103                         //NumMessage("iHitRate = ",iHitRate);
01104 
01105                         // calculate chance to REALLY hit: throw accurately AND get past cover
01106                         ubChanceToReallyHit = (ubChanceToHit * ubChanceToGetThrough) / 100;
01107 
01108                         // if we can't REALLY hit at all
01109                         if (ubChanceToReallyHit == 0)
01110                               continue;              // next gridno
01111       
01112                         // calculate the combined "attack value" for this opponent
01113                         // maximum possible attack value here should be about 140 million
01114                         // typical attack value here should be about 500 thousand
01115                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcbestthrow: checking attack value");
01116                         iAttackValue = (iHitRate * ubChanceToReallyHit * iTotalThreatValue) / 1000;
01117                         //NumMessage("THROW AttackValue = ",iAttackValue / 1000);
01118 
01119                         // unlike SHOOTing and STABbing, find strictly the highest attackValue
01120                         if (iAttackValue > pBestThrow->iAttackValue)
01121                         {
01122                               #ifdef DEBUGATTACKS
01123                                     DebugAI( String( "CalcBestThrow: new best attackValue vs %d = %d\n",ubOpponentID[ubLoop],iAttackValue ) );
01124                               #endif
01125 
01126                               // OOOF!  That was a lot of work!  But we've got a new best target!
01127                               pBestThrow->ubPossible           = TRUE;
01128                               pBestThrow->ubOpponent           = ubOpponentID[ubLoop];
01129                               pBestThrow->ubAimTime           = ubMaxPossibleAimTime;
01130                               pBestThrow->ubChanceToReallyHit = ubChanceToReallyHit;
01131                               pBestThrow->sTarget             = sGridNo;
01132                               pBestThrow->iAttackValue        = iAttackValue;
01133                               pBestThrow->ubAPCost            = ubMinAPcost + ubMaxPossibleAimTime;
01134                               pBestThrow->bTargetLevel                        = bOpponentLevel[ubLoop];
01135 
01136                               //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"new best THROW AttackValue = %d at grid #%d",iAttackValue/100000,gridno);
01137                               //PopMessage(tempstr);
01138                         }
01139                   }
01140             }
01141       }
01142 
01143       // this is try to minimize enemies wasting their (limited) toss attacks:
01144       switch( ubDiff )
01145       {
01146             case 0:
01147             case 1:
01148                   // don't use unless have a 70% chance to hit
01149                   if (pBestThrow->ubChanceToReallyHit < 70)
01150                   {
01151                         pBestThrow->ubPossible = FALSE;
01152                   }
01153                   break;
01154             case 2:
01155             case 3:
01156             case 4:
01157                   // don't use unless have a 50% chance to hit
01158                   if (pBestThrow->ubChanceToReallyHit < 50)
01159                   {
01160                         pBestThrow->ubPossible = FALSE;
01161                   }
01162                   break;
01163             default:
01164                   break;
01165       }
01166 
01167       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"calcbestthrow done");
01168 }

01170 void CalcBestStab(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, ATTACKTYPE *pBestStab, BOOLEAN fBladeAttack )
01171 {
01172  UINT32 uiLoop;
01173  INT32 iAttackValue;
01174  INT32 iThreatValue,iHitRate,iBestHitRate,iPercentBetter, iEstDamage;
01175  BOOLEAN fSurpriseStab;
01176  UINT8 ubRawAPCost,ubMinAPCost,ubMaxPossibleAimTime,ubAimTime,ubBestAimTime;
01177  UINT8 ubChanceToHit,ubChanceToReallyHit,ubBestChanceToHit = 0;
01178  SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
01179  UINT16 usTrueMovementMode;
01180  
01181  InitAttackType(pBestStab);      // set all structure fields to defaults
01182 
01183  pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
01184 
01185  // temporarily make this guy run so we get a proper AP cost value
01186  // from CalcTotalAPsToAttack
01187  usTrueMovementMode = pSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
01188  pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
01189 
01190  // determine which attack against which target has the greatest attack value
01191 
01192  for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01193  {
01194       pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01195 
01196       // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
01197       if (!pOpponent || !pOpponent->bLife)
01198      continue;          // next merc
01199 
01200    // if this man is neutral / on the same side, he's not an opponent
01201    if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpponent->bSide) )
01202      continue;          // next merc
01203 
01204    // if this opponent is not currently in sight (ignore known but unseen!)
01205       if (pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
01206      continue;          // next merc
01207 
01208        // if this opponent is not on the same level
01209        if (pSoldier->bLevel != pOpponent->bLevel)
01210      continue;          // next merc
01211 
01212             // Special stuff for Carmen the bounty hunter
01213             if (pSoldier->bAttitude == ATTACKSLAYONLY && pOpponent->ubProfile != 64)
01214                   continue;  // next opponent
01215 
01216 #ifdef DEBUGATTACKS
01217    DebugAI( String( "%s can see %s\n",pSoldier->name,ExtMen[pOpponent->ubID].name ) );
01218 #endif
01219 
01220    // calculate minimum action points required to stab at this opponent
01221        ubMinAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier,pOpponent->sGridNo,ADDTURNCOST, 0 );
01222 
01223    //ubMinAPCost = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier,pOpponent->sGridNo,ADDTURNCOST);
01224    //NumMessage("MinAPcost to stab this opponent = ",ubMinAPCost);
01225 
01226    // Human: if I don't have enough APs left to get there & stab at this guy, skip 'im.
01227        // Monster:  I'll do an extra check later on to see if I can reach the guy this turn.
01228 
01229        // if 0 is returned then no path!
01230        if ( ubMinAPCost > pSoldier->bActionPoints || ubMinAPCost == 0 )
01231        {
01232             continue;
01233             /*
01234              if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
01235              {
01236                    // hardcode ubMinAPCost so that aiming time is 0 and can start move to stab
01237                    // at any time
01238                ubMinAPCost = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
01239              }
01240              else
01241              {
01242                continue;          // next merc
01243              }
01244              */
01245        }
01246 
01247    //KeepInterfaceGoing();
01248 
01249    // calc next attack's minimum stabbing cost (excludes movement & turning)
01250    //ubRawAPCost = MinAPsToShootOrStab(pSoldier,pOpponent->sGridNo, FALSE) - AP_CHANGE_TARGET;
01251        ubRawAPCost = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier,pOpponent->sGridNo, FALSE) - AP_CHANGE_TARGET;
01252    //NumMessage("ubRawAPCost to stab this opponent = ",ubRawAPCost);
01253 
01254 
01255    // determine if this is a surprise stab (must be next to opponent & unseen)
01256    fSurpriseStab = FALSE;        // assume it is not a surprise stab
01257 
01258    // if opponent doesn't see the attacker
01259    if (pOpponent->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
01260     {
01261                   fSurpriseStab = TRUE;
01262 
01263      // and he's only one space away from attacker
01264      if (SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pOpponent->sGridNo) == 1)
01265       {
01266         fSurpriseStab = TRUE;   // we got 'im lined up where we want 'im!
01267       }
01268     }
01269 
01270 
01271    iBestHitRate = 0;                     // reset best hit rate to minimum
01272 
01273    // calculate the maximum possible aiming time
01274    ubMaxPossibleAimTime = min(AllowedAimingLevels(pSoldier),pSoldier->bActionPoints - ubMinAPCost);
01275    //NumMessage("Max Possible Aim Time = ",ubMaxPossibleAimTime);
01276 
01277    // consider the various aiming times
01278    for (ubAimTime = AP_MIN_AIM_ATTACK; ubAimTime <= ubMaxPossibleAimTime; ubAimTime++)
01279     {
01280      //HandleMyMouseCursor(KEYBOARDALSO);
01281 
01282      //NumMessage("ubAimTime = ",ubAimTime);
01283 
01284      if (!fSurpriseStab)
01285       {
01286                         if (fBladeAttack)
01287                         {
01288                               ubChanceToHit = (UINT8) CalcChanceToStab(pSoldier,pOpponent,ubAimTime);
01289                         }
01290                         else
01291                         {
01292                               ubChanceToHit = (UINT8) CalcChanceToPunch(pSoldier,pOpponent,ubAimTime);
01293                         }
01294       }
01295      else
01296        ubChanceToHit = MAXCHANCETOHIT;
01297      //NumMessage("chance to Hit = ",ubChanceToHit);
01298 
01299      //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"Vs. %s, at AimTime %d, ubChanceToHit = %d",ExtMen[pOpponent->ubID].name,ubAimTime,ubChanceToHit);
01300      //PopMessage(tempstr);
01301 
01302        if (ubRawAPCost < 1)
01303              ubRawAPCost = ubMinAPCost;
01304 
01305      iHitRate = (pSoldier->bActionPoints * ubChanceToHit) / (ubRawAPCost + ubAimTime);
01306      //NumMessage("hitRate = ",iHitRate);
01307 
01308      // if aiming for this amount of time produces a better hit rate
01309      if (iHitRate > iBestHitRate)
01310       {
01311        iBestHitRate = iHitRate;
01312        ubBestAimTime = ubAimTime;
01313        ubBestChanceToHit = ubChanceToHit;
01314       }
01315     }
01316 
01317 
01318    // if we can't get any kind of hit rate at all
01319    if (iBestHitRate == 0)
01320      continue;          // next opponent
01321 
01322    // stabs are not affected by cover, so the chance to REALLY hit is the same
01323    ubChanceToReallyHit = ubBestChanceToHit;
01324 
01325    // calculate this opponent's threat value
01326    // NOTE: ignore my cover!  By the time I run beside him I won't have any!
01327    iThreatValue = CalcManThreatValue(pOpponent,pSoldier->sGridNo,FALSE,pSoldier);
01328 
01329 
01330    // estimate the damage this stab would do to this opponent
01331    iEstDamage = EstimateStabDamage(pSoldier,pOpponent,ubBestChanceToHit, fBladeAttack );
01332    //NumMessage("STAB EstDamage = ", iEstDamage);
01333 
01334    // calculate the combined "attack value" for this opponent
01335    // highest possible value before division should be about 1 billion...
01336    // normal value before division should be about 5 million...
01337    iAttackValue = ( iEstDamage * iBestHitRate * ubChanceToReallyHit * iThreatValue) / 1000;
01338    //NumMessage("STAB AttackValue = ",iAttackValue / 1000);
01339 
01340 #ifdef DEBUGATTACKS
01341        DebugAI( String( "CalcBestStab: best AttackValue vs %d = %d\n",ubLoop,iAttackValue ) );
01342 #endif
01343 
01344    // if we can hurt the guy, OR probably not, but at least it's our best
01345    // chance to actually hit him and maybe scare him, knock him down, etc.
01346    if ((iAttackValue > 0) || (ubChanceToReallyHit > pBestStab->ubChanceToReallyHit))
01347     {
01348      // if there already was another viable target
01349      if (pBestStab->ubChanceToReallyHit > 0)
01350       {
01351        // OK, how does our chance to hit him compare to the previous best one?
01352        iPercentBetter = ((ubChanceToReallyHit * 100) / pBestStab->ubChanceToReallyHit) - 100;
01353 
01354        // if this chance to really hit is more than 50% worse, and the other
01355        // guy is conscious at all
01356        if ((iPercentBetter < -PERCENT_TO_IGNORE_THREAT) && (Menptr[pBestStab->ubOpponent].bLife >= OKLIFE))
01357                          // then stick with the older guy as the better target
01358                          continue;
01359 
01360        // if this chance to really hit between 50% worse to 50% better
01361        if (iPercentBetter < PERCENT_TO_IGNORE_THREAT)
01362                         {
01363                          // then the one with the higher ATTACK VALUE is the better target
01364                          if (iAttackValue < pBestStab->iAttackValue)
01365                                // the previous guy is more important since he's more dangerous
01366                                continue;            // next opponent
01367                         }
01368       }
01369 
01370      // OOOF!  That was a lot of work!  But we've got a new best target!
01371      pBestStab->ubPossible          = TRUE;
01372      pBestStab->ubOpponent          = pOpponent->ubID;
01373      pBestStab->ubAimTime           = ubBestAimTime;
01374      pBestStab->ubChanceToReallyHit = ubChanceToReallyHit;
01375      pBestStab->sTarget             = pOpponent->sGridNo;
01376              pBestStab->bTargetLevel        = pOpponent->bLevel;
01377      pBestStab->iAttackValue        = iAttackValue;
01378      pBestStab->ubAPCost            = ubMinAPCost + ubBestAimTime;
01379     }
01380   }
01381 
01382       pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = usTrueMovementMode;
01383 }

01539 UINT8 NumMercsCloseTo( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubMaxDist )
01540 {
01541       INT8                                bNumber = 0;
01542       UINT32                              uiLoop;
01543       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
01544 
01545       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01546       {
01547             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01548 
01549             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01550             {
01551                   if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= ubMaxDist)
01552                   {
01553                         bNumber++;
01554                   }
01555             }
01556       }
01557 
01558       return( bNumber );
01559 }

01561 INT32 EstimateShotDamage(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent, UINT8 ubChanceToHit)
01562 {
01563  INT32 iRange,iMaxRange,iPowerLost;
01564  INT32 iDamage;
01565  UINT8 ubBonus;
01566  INT32 iHeadProt = 0, iTorsoProt = 0, iLegProt = 0;
01567  INT32 iTotalProt;
01568  INT8 bPlatePos;
01569  UINT8      ubAmmoType;
01570 
01571 /*
01572       if ( pOpponent->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01573       {
01574             // only thing that can damage vehicles is HEAP rounds?
01575             return( 0 );            
01576       }
01577       */
01578 
01579       if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
01580       {
01581             ubAmmoType = AMMO_KNIFE;
01582       }
01583       else
01584       {
01585             ubAmmoType = pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType;
01586       }
01587 
01588  // calculate distance to target, obtain his gun's maximum range rating
01589 
01590  iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, pOpponent->sGridNo );
01591  iMaxRange = Weapon[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usRange;
01592 
01593  // bullet loses speed and penetrating power, 50% loss per maximum range
01594  iPowerLost = ((50 * iRange) / iMaxRange);
01595 
01596  // up to 50% extra impact for making particularly accurate successful shots
01597  ubBonus = ubChanceToHit / 4;       // /4 is really /2 and /2 again
01598 
01599  iDamage = ((GetDamage(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS])) * (100 - iPowerLost + ubBonus) / 100) ;
01600 
01601  //NumMessage("Pre-protection damage: ",damage);
01602 
01603  // if opponent is wearing a helmet
01604  if (pOpponent->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem)
01605  {
01606    iHeadProt += (INT32) Armour[Item[pOpponent->inv[HELMETPOS].usItem].ubClassIndex].ubProtection *
01607                               (INT32) pOpponent->inv[HELMETPOS].bStatus[0] / 100;
01608       }
01609 
01610       // if opponent is wearing a protective vest
01611       if ( !AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].ignoreArmour )
01612       {
01613             // monster spit and knives ignore kevlar vests
01614             if (pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS].usItem)
01615             {
01616                   iTorsoProt += (INT32) Armour[Item[pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS].usItem].ubClassIndex].ubProtection *
01617                                     (INT32) pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS].bStatus[0] / 100;
01618             }
01619       }
01620 
01621       // check for ceramic plates; these do affect monster spit
01622       bPlatePos = FindFirstArmourAttachment( &(pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS]) );
01623       if (bPlatePos != -1)
01624       {
01625             iTorsoProt += (INT32) Armour[Item[pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS].usAttachItem[bPlatePos]].ubClassIndex].ubProtection *
01626                                     (INT32) pOpponent->inv[VESTPOS].bAttachStatus[bPlatePos] / 100;
01627       }
01628 
01629 
01630       // if opponent is wearing armoured leggings (LEGPOS)
01631       if ( !AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].ignoreArmour )
01632       {     // monster spit and knives ignore kevlar leggings
01633             if (pOpponent->inv[LEGPOS].usItem)
01634             {
01635                   iLegProt += (INT32) Armour[Item[pOpponent->inv[LEGPOS].usItem].ubClassIndex].ubProtection *
01636                                     (INT32) pOpponent->inv[LEGPOS].bStatus[0] / 100;
01637             }
01638       }
01639 
01640       // 15% of all shots are to the head, 80% are to the torso.  Calc. avg. prot.
01641       // NB: make AI guys shoot at head 15% of time, 5% of time at legs
01642 
01643       iTotalProt = ((15 * iHeadProt) + (75 * iTorsoProt) + 5 * iLegProt) / 100;
01644       iTotalProt = (INT32) (iTotalProt * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].armourImpactReductionDivisor) );
01645       //switch (ubAmmoType)
01646       //{
01647       //    case AMMO_HP:
01648       //          iTotalProt = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iTotalProt );
01649       //          break;
01650       //    case AMMO_AP:
01651       //          iTotalProt = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_AP( iTotalProt );
01652       //          break;
01653       //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
01654       //          iTotalProt = AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( iTotalProt );
01655       //          break;
01656       //    default:
01657       //          break;
01658       //}
01659 
01660       iDamage -= iTotalProt;
01661  //NumMessage("After-protection damage: ",damage);
01662 
01663       //if (ubAmmoType == AMMO_HP)
01664       //{
01665       //    // increase after-armour damage
01666       //    iDamage = AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iDamage );
01667       //}
01668       iDamage = (INT32)(iDamage * AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].afterArmourDamageMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].afterArmourDamageDivisor) ) ;
01669 
01670       if (AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].monsterSpit )
01671       {
01672             // cheat and emphasize shots
01673             //iDamage = (iDamage * 15) / 10;
01674             switch( pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand].usItem )
01675             {
01676                   // explosive damage is 100-200% that of the rated, so multiply by 3/2s here
01677                   case CREATURE_QUEEN_SPIT: //TODO: Madd - remove the hardcoding here
01678                         iDamage += ( 3 * Explosive[ Item[ LARGE_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex ].ubDamage * NumMercsCloseTo( pOpponent->sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ LARGE_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex ].ubRadius ) ) / 2;
01679                         break;
01680                   case CREATURE_OLD_MALE_SPIT:
01681                         iDamage += ( 3 * Explosive[ Item[ SMALL_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex ].ubDamage * NumMercsCloseTo( pOpponent->sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ SMALL_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex  ].ubRadius ) ) / 2;
01682                         break;
01683                   default:
01684                         iDamage += ( 3 * Explosive[ Item[ VERY_SMALL_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex ].ubDamage * NumMercsCloseTo( pOpponent->sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ VERY_SMALL_CREATURE_GAS ].ubClassIndex  ].ubRadius ) ) / 2;
01685                         break;
01686             }
01687   }
01688 
01689  if (iDamage < 1)
01690    iDamage = 1;  // assume we can do at LEAST 1 pt minimum damage
01691 
01692  return( iDamage );
01693 }
01694 
01695 INT32 EstimateThrowDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubItemPos, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent, INT16 sGridno )
01696 {
01697       UINT16      ubExplosiveIndex;
01698       INT32 iExplosDamage, iBreathDamage, iArmourAmount, iDamage = 0;
01699       INT8  bSlot;
01700 
01701 
01702       if( pSoldier == NULL || pOpponent == NULL || ubItemPos > NUM_INV_SLOTS || sGridno > NUMBEROFTILES )
01703             return 0;
01704 
01705       if( pSoldier->inv[ubItemPos].usItem == NOTHING )
01706             return 0;
01707 
01708 
01709       //switch ( pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem )
01710       //{
01711       //case GL_SMOKE_GRENADE:
01712       //case SMOKE_GRENADE:
01713       //    // Don't want to value throwing smoke very much.  This value is based relative
01714       //    // to the value for knocking somebody down, which was giving values that were
01715       //    // too high
01716       //    return( 5 );
01717       //case RPG7:
01718       //case ROCKET_LAUNCHER:
01719       //    ubExplosiveIndex = Item[ C1 ].ubClassIndex;
01720       //    break;
01721       //default:
01722       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem].singleshotrocketlauncher )
01723             ubExplosiveIndex = Item[ C1 ].ubClassIndex;
01724       else if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem].rocketlauncher || Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem].grenadelauncher || Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem].mortar )
01725       {
01726             bSlot = FindLaunchableAttachment(&pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ],pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem ) ;
01727             if ( bSlot != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01728                   ubExplosiveIndex = Item[pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ].usItem].ubClassIndex;
01729             else
01730                   return 0;
01731       }
01732       else if ( Explosive[Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubItemPos ].usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType == EXPLOSV_SMOKE )
01733             return 5;
01734       else
01735             ubExplosiveIndex = Item[ pSoldier->inv[ubItemPos].usItem ].ubClassIndex;
01736 
01737       //          break;
01738       //}   
01739       // JA2Gold: added
01740       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ubItemPos].usItem].flare )
01741       {
01742             return( 5 * ( LightTrueLevel( pOpponent->sGridNo, pOpponent->bLevel ) - NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY ) );
01743       }
01744 
01745 
01746       iExplosDamage = ( ( (INT32) Explosive[ ubExplosiveIndex ].ubDamage ) * 3) / 2;
01747       iBreathDamage = ( ( (INT32) Explosive[ ubExplosiveIndex ].ubStunDamage ) * 5) / 4;
01748 
01749       if ( Explosive[ ubExplosiveIndex ].ubType == EXPLOSV_TEARGAS || Explosive[ ubExplosiveIndex ].ubType == EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS )
01750       {
01751             // if target gridno is outdoors (where tear gas lasts only 1-2 turns)
01752             if (gpWorldLevelData[sGridno].ubTerrainID != FLAT_FLOOR)
01753                   iBreathDamage /= 2;       // reduce effective breath damage by 1/2
01754 
01755             bSlot = FindObj( pOpponent, GASMASK );
01756             if (bSlot == HEAD1POS || bSlot == HEAD2POS)
01757             {
01758                   // take condition of the gas mask into account - it could be leaking
01759                   iBreathDamage = (iBreathDamage * (100 - pOpponent->inv[bSlot].bStatus[0])) / 100;
01760                   //NumMessage("damage after GAS MASK: ",iBreathDamage);
01761             }
01762 
01763       }
01764       if ( Explosive[ ubExplosiveIndex ].ubType == EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS )
01765       {
01766             // if target gridno is outdoors (where tear gas lasts only 1-2 turns)
01767             if (gpWorldLevelData[sGridno].ubTerrainID != FLAT_FLOOR)
01768                   iBreathDamage /= 2;       // reduce effective breath damage by 1/2
01769       }
01770       else if (iExplosDamage)
01771       {
01772             // EXPLOSION DAMAGE is spread amongst locations
01773             iArmourAmount = ArmourVersusExplosivesPercent( pSoldier );
01774             iExplosDamage -= iExplosDamage * iArmourAmount / 100;
01775 
01776             if (iExplosDamage < 1)
01777                   iExplosDamage = 1;
01778       }
01779 
01780       // if this opponent is standing
01781       if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND)
01782       {
01783             // 15 pt. flat bonus for knocking him down (for ANY type of explosion)
01784             iDamage += 15;
01785       }
01786 
01787       if ( pOpponent->bBreath < OKBREATH || AM_A_ROBOT( pOpponent ) )
01788       {
01789             // don't bother to count breath damage against people already down
01790             iBreathDamage = 0;
01791       }
01792 
01793       // estimate combined "damage" value considering combined health/breath damage
01794       iDamage += iExplosDamage + (iBreathDamage / 3);
01795 
01796       // approximate chance of the grenade going off (Ian's formulas are too funky)
01797       // then use that to reduce the expected damage because thing may not blow!
01798       iDamage = (iDamage * pSoldier->inv[ubItemPos].bStatus[0]) / 100;
01799 
01800       // if the target gridno is in water, grenade may not blow (guess 50% of time)
01801       /*
01802       if (TTypeList[Grid[gridno].land] >= LAKETYPE)
01803       iDamage /= 2;
01804       */
01805 
01806       return( iDamage);
01807 }
01808 
01809 INT32 EstimateStabDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent,
01810                                                                               UINT8 ubChanceToHit, BOOLEAN fBladeAttack )
01811 {
01812       INT32 iImpact, iFluke, iBonus;
01813 
01814       UINT16      usItem;
01815 
01816       usItem = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
01817 
01818       if (fBladeAttack)
01819       {
01820             iImpact = GetDamage(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
01821             iImpact += EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) / 20; // 0 to 5 for strength, adjusted by damage taken
01822       }
01823       else
01824       {
01825             // NB martial artists don't get a bonus for using brass knuckles!
01826             if (pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon && !( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) ) )
01827             {
01828                   iImpact = GetDamage(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
01829             }
01830             else
01831             {
01832                   // base HTH damage
01833                   iImpact = 5;
01834             }
01835             iImpact += EffectiveStrength( pSoldier ) / 5; // 0 to 20 for strength, adjusted by damage taken
01836       }
01837 
01838 
01839       iImpact += (pSoldier->bExpLevel / 2); // 0 to 4 for level
01840 
01841       iFluke = 0;
01842       iBonus = ubChanceToHit / 4;                     // up to 50% extra impact for accurate attacks
01843       
01844       iImpact = iImpact * (100 + iFluke + iBonus) / 100;
01845 
01846       if (!fBladeAttack)
01847       {
01848             // add bonuses for hand-to-hand and martial arts
01849             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) )
01850             {
01851                   iImpact = iImpact * (100 + gbSkillTraitBonus[MARTIALARTS] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) ) / 100;
01852             }
01853             if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, HANDTOHAND ) )              
01854             {
01855                   iImpact = iImpact * (100 + gbSkillTraitBonus[HANDTOHAND] * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, HANDTOHAND ) ) / 100;
01856             }     
01857             // Here, if we're doing a bare-fisted attack,
01858             // we want to pay attention just to wounds inflicted
01859             iImpact = iImpact / PUNCH_REAL_DAMAGE_PORTION;
01860       }
01861 
01862       if (iImpact < 1)
01863       {
01864             iImpact = 1;
01865       }
01866 
01867       return( iImpact );
01868 }

01870 INT8 TryToReload( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01871 {
01872       INT8        bSlot;
01873       WEAPONTYPE *pWeapon;
01874       OBJECTTYPE *pObj, *pObj2;
01875 
01876       pWeapon = &(Weapon[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem]);
01877       bSlot = FindAmmo( pSoldier, pWeapon->ubCalibre, pWeapon->ubMagSize, NO_SLOT );
01878 
01879       //if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
01880       //{
01881       //    if (ReloadGun( pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) ))
01882       //    {
01883       //          return( TRUE );
01884       //    }
01885       //}
01886 
01887 //<SB> manual recharge
01888       pObj = &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]);
01889 
01890       if (pObj->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
01891       {
01892             pObj->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
01893 
01894             DeductPoints(pSoldier, Weapon[Item[(pObj)->usItem].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually, 0);
01895             
01896             PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
01897             
01898 
01899             if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
01900             {
01901                   pObj2 = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
01902 
01903                   if (pObj2->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj2->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
01904                   {                       
01905                         pObj2->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
01906                         PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj2->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
01907                   }
01908             }
01909             
01910             return TRUE;
01911       }
01912       else
01913       {
01914             if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
01915             {
01916                   pObj2 = &(pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS]);
01917 
01918                   if (pObj2->ubGunShotsLeft && !(pObj2->ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER) )
01919                   {
01920                         pObj2->ubGunState |= GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER;
01921                         
01922                         DeductPoints(pSoldier, Weapon[Item[(pObj2)->usItem].ubClassIndex].APsToReloadManually, 0);
01923 
01924                         PlayJA2Sample( Weapon[ Item[pObj2->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ManualReloadSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
01925                         
01926                         return TRUE;
01927                   }
01928             }
01929       }
01930 //</SB>
01931 
01932       if (bSlot != NO_SLOT && ReloadGun( pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) ))
01933       {
01934                   return( TRUE );
01935       }
01936 
01937       return( NOSHOOT_NOAMMO );
01938 }

01964 INT8 CanNPCAttack(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
01965 {
01966       INT8        bCanAttack;
01967       INT8        bWeaponIn;
01968 
01969       // NEUTRAL civilians are not allowed to attack, but those that are not
01970       // neutral (KILLNPC mission guynums, escorted guys) can, if they're armed
01971       if (PTR_CIVILIAN && pSoldier->bNeutral)
01972       {
01973             return(FALSE);
01974       }
01975 
01976       // test if if we are able to attack (in general, not at any specific target)
01977       bCanAttack = OKToAttack(pSoldier,NOWHERE);
01978 
01979       // if soldier can't attack because he doesn't have a weapon or is out of ammo
01980       // or his weapon isn't loaded
01981       if ( bCanAttack == NOSHOOT_NOAMMO ) // || NOLOAD
01982       {
01983             // try to reload it
01984             bCanAttack = TryToReload( pSoldier );
01985       }
01986       else if (bCanAttack == NOSHOOT_NOWEAPON)
01987       {
01988             // look for another weapon
01989             bWeaponIn = FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON );
01990             if (bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT)
01991             {
01992                 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"cannpcattack: swapping weapon into hand");
01993                   RearrangePocket( pSoldier, HANDPOS, bWeaponIn, FOREVER );
01994                   // look for another weapon if this one is 1-handed
01995 //                if ( (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN) && !(Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED ) )
01996                   if ( (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN) && !(Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].twohanded ) )
01997                   {
01998                         // look for another pistol/SMG if available
01999                         bWeaponIn = FindAIUsableObjClassWithin( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON, BIGPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
02000 //                      if (bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT && (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bWeaponIn ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN) && !(Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bWeaponIn ].usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED ) )
02001                         if (bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT && (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bWeaponIn ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN) && !(Item[ pSoldier->inv[ bWeaponIn ].usItem ].twohanded ) )
02002                         {
02003                             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"cannpcattack: swapping weapon into holster");
02004                               RearrangePocket( pSoldier, SECONDHANDPOS, bWeaponIn, FOREVER );
02005                         }
02006                   }
02007                   // might need to reload
02008                   bCanAttack = CanNPCAttack( pSoldier );
02009             }     
02010       }
02011 
02012 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
02013       if (bCanAttack != TRUE) // if for any reason we can't attack right now
02014       {
02015             //LocateMember(pSoldier->ubID,SETLOCATOR); // locate to this NPC, don't center
02016             STR16 tempstr;
02017             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s can't attack! (not OKToAttack, Reason code = %d)",pSoldier->name,bCanAttack);
02018             AIPopMessage(tempstr);
02019       }
02020 #endif
02021 
02022       return( bCanAttack );
02023 }
02024 
02025 void CheckIfTossPossible(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, ATTACKTYPE *pBestThrow)
02026 {
02027       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CheckIfTossPossible");
02028       UINT8 ubMinAPcost;
02029 
02030       pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
02031 
02032       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
02033       {
02034             pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = FindCannon(pSoldier);//FindObj( pSoldier, TANK_CANNON );
02035       }
02036       else
02037       {
02038             pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_LAUNCHER );
02039 
02040             if ( pBestThrow->bWeaponIn == NO_SLOT )
02041             {
02042                   // Consider rocket launcher/cannon
02043                   pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = FindRocketLauncherOrCannon( pSoldier );
02044                   if ( pBestThrow->bWeaponIn == NO_SLOT )
02045                   {
02046                         //no rocket launcher -- let's look for an underslung/attached GL
02047                         INT8 bGunSlot = FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_GUN );
02048                         if ( bGunSlot != NO_SLOT && IsGrenadeLauncherAttached(&pSoldier->inv[bGunSlot]) )
02049                         {
02050                               pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = bGunSlot;
02051                               pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_ATTACHED_GL;
02052                         }
02053                         else // no rocket launcher or attached GL, consider grenades
02054                               pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = FindThrowableGrenade( pSoldier );
02055                   }
02056                   else
02057                   {
02058                         // Have rocket launcher... maybe have grenades as well.  which one to use?
02059                         if ( pSoldier->bAIMorale > MORALE_WORRIED && PreRandom( 2 ) )
02060                         {
02061                               pBestThrow->bWeaponIn = FindThrowableGrenade( pSoldier );
02062                         }
02063                   }
02064             }
02065       }
02066 
02067       // if the soldier does have a tossable item somewhere
02068       if (pBestThrow->bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT)
02069       {
02070             // if it's in his holster, swap it into his hand temporarily
02071             if (pBestThrow->bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
02072             {
02073                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"checkiftosspossible: swapping item into hand");
02074                   RearrangePocket(pSoldier, HANDPOS, pBestThrow->bWeaponIn, TEMPORARILY);
02075             }
02076 
02077             
02078             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"checkiftosspossible: get minapstoattack");
02079             // get the minimum cost to attack with this tossable item
02080             ubMinAPcost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sLastTarget, DONTADDTURNCOST);
02081 
02082             // if we can afford the minimum AP cost to throw this tossable item
02083             if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= ubMinAPcost)
02084             {
02085                   // then look around for a worthy target (which sets bestThrow.ubPossible)
02086                   CalcBestThrow( pSoldier, pBestThrow );
02087             }
02088 
02089             // if it was in his holster, swap it back into his holster for now
02090             if (pBestThrow->bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
02091             {
02092                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"checkiftosspossible: swapping item into holster");
02093                   RearrangePocket( pSoldier, HANDPOS, pBestThrow->bWeaponIn, TEMPORARILY );
02094             }
02095   }
02096 }
02097 
02098 INT8 CountAdjacentSpreadTargets( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sFirstTarget, INT8 bTargetLevel )
02099 {

02307                         case 3:

02310                               break;
02311                         case 4:

02326                               bCheckDir = (bDir) % 8;
02327                               bTargetIndex = 3;
02328                               break;

02330                   }
02331             }
02332             if (bDirLoop == 6 && bTargets > 1)
02333             {
02334                   // we're done!  otherwise we continue and try to find people in front/behind
02335                   break;
02336             }
02337             else if (pTargets[bTargetIndex] != NULL)
02338             {
02339                   continue;
02340             }
02341             sTarget = sFirstTarget + DirIncrementer[bCheckDir];
02342             pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier( sTarget, bTargetLevel );
02343             if (pTarget && pSoldier->bOppList[ pTarget->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
02344             {
02345                   bOtherAdjacents = CountAdjacentSpreadTargets( pSoldier, sTarget, bTargetLevel );
02346                   if (bOtherAdjacents > bAdjacents)
02347                   {
02348                         // we should do a spread-burst there instead!
02349                         return( CalcSpreadBurst( pSoldier, sTarget, bTargetLevel ) );
02350                   }
02351                   pTargets[bTargetIndex] = pTarget;
02352                   bTargets++;
02353             }
02354       }
02355 
02356       if (bTargets > 1)
02357       {
02358             // Move all the locations down in the array if necessary
02359             // Check the 4th position
02360             if (pTargets[3] == NULL && pTargets[4] != NULL)
02361             {
02362                   pTargets[3] = pTargets[4]; 
02363                   pTargets[4] = NULL;
02364             }
02365             // Check the first two positions; we know the 3rd value is set because
02366             // it's our initial target
02367             if (pTargets[1] == NULL)
02368             {
02369                   pTargets[1] = pTargets[2];
02370                   pTargets[2] = pTargets[3];
02371                   pTargets[3] = pTargets[4];
02372                   pTargets[4] = NULL;
02373             }
02374             if (pTargets[0] == NULL)
02375             {
02376                   pTargets[0] = pTargets[1];
02377                   pTargets[1] = pTargets[2];
02378                   pTargets[2] = pTargets[3];
02379                   pTargets[3] = pTargets[4];
02380                   pTargets[4] = NULL;
02381             }
02382             // now 50% chance to reorganize to fire in reverse order
02383             if (Random( 2 ))
02384             {
02385                   for( bLoop = 0; bLoop < bTargets / 2; bLoop++)
02386                   {
02387                         pTarget = pTargets[bLoop];
02388                         pTargets[bLoop] = pTargets[bTargets - 1 - bLoop];
02389                         pTargets[bTargets - 1 - bLoop] = pTarget;
02390                   }
02391             }
02392             AIPickBurstLocations( pSoldier, bTargets, pTargets );
02393             pSoldier->fDoSpread = TRUE;
02394       }
02395       return( sFirstTarget );
02396 }

02398 INT16 AdvanceToFiringRange( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sClosestOpponent )
02399 {
02400       // see how far we can go down a path and still shoot
02401 
02402       INT8        bAttackCost, bTrueActionPoints;
02403       UINT16      usActionData;
02404 
02405       bAttackCost = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier, sClosestOpponent, ADDTURNCOST);
02406 
02407       if (bAttackCost >= pSoldier->bActionPoints)
02408       {
02409             // probably want to go as far as possible!
02410             // return( NOWHERE );
02411             return( GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards( pSoldier, sClosestOpponent, AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT ) );
02412       }
02413 
02414       bTrueActionPoints = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
02415 
02416       pSoldier->bActionPoints -= bAttackCost;
02417 
02418       usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards( pSoldier, sClosestOpponent, AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT );
02419 
02420       pSoldier->bActionPoints = bTrueActionPoints;
02421       
02422       return( usActionData );
02423 
02424 }

02428 void CheckIfShotPossible(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, ATTACKTYPE *pBestShot, BOOLEAN suppressionFire)
02429 {
02430       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CheckIfShotPossible");
02431       UINT8 ubMinAPcost;
02432       pBestShot->ubPossible = FALSE;
02433 
02434       if ( !TANK( pSoldier ) )
02435       {
02436             // AIs never have more than one gun anyway
02437             pBestShot->bWeaponIn = FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_GUN );
02438       }
02439 
02440       // if the soldier does have a long range rifle
02441       if (pBestShot->bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT)
02442       {
02443             OBJECTTYPE * pObj = &pSoldier->inv[pBestShot->bWeaponIn];
02444             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CheckIfShotPossible: found a gun item # %d",pObj->usItem ));
02445             
02446             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CheckIfShotPossible: weapon type %d",Weapon [pObj->usItem ].ubWeaponType ));
02447 
02448             // if it's in his holster, swap it into his hand temporarily
02449             if (pBestShot->bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
02450             {
02451                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CheckIfShotPossible: Rearranging pocket");
02452                   RearrangePocket(pSoldier, HANDPOS, pBestShot->bWeaponIn, TEMPORARILY);
02453             }
02454 
02455             if ( (!suppressionFire && ( (IsScoped(pObj) && GunRange(pObj) > 30) || pSoldier->bOrders == SNIPER ) ) || (suppressionFire  && IsGunAutofireCapable(pSoldier,pBestShot->bWeaponIn ) && GetMagSize(pObj) > 30 && pObj->ubGunShotsLeft > 20 ))
02456             {
02457                   // get the minimum cost to attack with this item
02458                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CheckIfShotPossible: getting min aps");
02459                   ubMinAPcost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sLastTarget, ADDTURNCOST);
02460                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CheckIfShotPossible: min AP cost: %d", ubMinAPcost));
02461 
02462                   // if we can afford the minimum AP cost 
02463                   if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= ubMinAPcost)
02464                   {
02465                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CheckIfShotPossible: CalcBestShot"));
02466                         // then look around for a worthy target (which sets bestThrow.ubPossible)
02467                         CalcBestShot( pSoldier, pBestShot,TRUE);
02468                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CheckIfShotPossible: CalcBestShot done"));
02469                   }
02470             }
02471             // if it was in his holster, swap it back into his holster for now
02472             if (pBestShot->bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
02473             {
02474                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CheckIfShotPossible: Rearranging pocket");
02475                   RearrangePocket( pSoldier, HANDPOS, pBestShot->bWeaponIn, TEMPORARILY );
02476             }
02477   }
